import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import UploadTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/UploadTimeline' import InviteTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/InviteTimeline' import FeatureTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/FeatureTimeline' import CategoryTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/CategoryTimeline' const NewTabLike=()=>{ const [post, setPost] = useState([]); const a= window.location.pathname var id = a.substring(a.lastIndexOf('/') + 1); // console.log(id) useEffect(() => { axios.post("http://localhost:4444/SinglePage",id).then(response => { console.log(response.data.imae); setPost(response.data); },[]); }); // axios.post('http://localhost:4444/SinglePage',id).then(response => { // console.log(response.data); // setPost(response.data); // }) // post.map(item =>{ // return( // // ) // }) return(
